name: Set Philips Hue via IFTTT
friendlyName: Communicate build result via IFTTT with Philips Hue
description: Reflects the outcome of the build by changing the color of your Philips Hue lamp with IFTTT.
author: Robert Raaijmakers

inputs.name: hueBridgeIp
inputs.label: Bridge Server Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The IP adres (and port) of your hue bridge. E.g. http://192.168.1.1:8080/

inputs.name: hueBridgeUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: A valid username to access the hue bridge (if it doesn't exist, it will be created).

inputs.name: hueBridgeLampId
inputs.label: Lamp ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of your lamp. If you have only one lamp linked. The most probable ID will be 1.

inputs.name: sendMailFrom
inputs.label: Emailaddress
inputs.helpMarkDown: E-mailaddress specified in IFTTT as 'send from' address.

inputs.name: buildNames
inputs.label: Comma seperated list of build names.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma seperated list of builds that are included to check, if none provided, all builds are checked.
